item.title: Flare - What is it?
item.description: Why Flare? With the dramatic increase in remote working and digital teams because of Covid-19 we are anticipating a surge in cyber threats throughout the world, specifically targeting . We wanted to create a solution to build a safer chat environment for any type of user. How does it work? Flare monitors channels and chat rooms from the background while only scanning messages that contain a URL. We compare the URL with security databases that are regularly updated and find any possible threat associated with it to let users know.

item.title: Slack Flarebot - How does it work?
item.description: What is it? Flarebot is a bot for slack that will passively monitor your channels for any malicious links. Getting Started To use Flarebot, you must first install the bot onto your slack workspace with this link. Once you’ve installed the bot onto your workspace, you will have to add the bot to a channel you want to monitor. The fastest way to add a bot to a channel is to do the /add command.
